On the 9th of August, the #SC clarified that the sexual act by a man with his wife, if she is above 15 years, is not a #maritalrape.
This raises questions about marital rape, consent, child-marriage in legal discourse and Law's failure to protect all minors equally.
Three articles from the #EPWArchive look into some of these issues--
